Question asked
(1) What does ‘consultation with affected communities’ – in the case of pollution, for
instance – mean in terms of actions?
(2) Could a company be compliant if it states that it has not done it even though its pollution
levels are under control under current law?
ESRS Reference
ESRS E2 paragraph 11 (b)
